Html:
Radioman do you know why the polygons get distorted with decimal zoom - 10.2? The mouse moving the map is also weird and not correctly panning - to hard to explain the behavior exactly. I am using BingMapProvider. The polygon border will disappear, and create a diagonal line when I highlight each point, til the zoom becomes a whole number. I will work on testing other providers as time becomes available. - Seems like all the providers have the same behavior.

Thanks
